title: [Atoll, Canopied Path]
description: Two paths converge into one here, ivory stepping stones from the southwest, obsidian from the southeast, creating a narrow, checkered path winding to the south.  The air surrounding the southern path shimmers with distortion, a copse of dark-thorned trees rising along either side to create a canopy overhead.  Skeletons of ships litter the waters of the ocean beyond, each worn from long exposure to weather.

A narrow path leads toward the atoll, the air surrounding it distorted.  A copse of dark-thorned trees crest either side of the path, creating a canopy overhead.  The skeletons of ships litter the waters of the ocean beyond, each worn from long exposure to weather.
